Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Eidenhoft Boulevard, just south of Khelleva Circle.
Room.LongDescription: The large plaza circle you see to the north is called Khelleva Circle because it connects three major roads which run east directly into the Khelleva Estate. The large traffic circle was in fact built by the Khelleva Family just as a show of wealth and commitment to the city that they live in. The Oceancrest Central Arena is located to the west, where you can hear loud cries of both victory and agony.
